[[inst_lh]]
==== LH

*Syntax:* lh [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}><<<shamt>], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Load signed 16-bit halfword from memory.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_lh.svg[LH encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/BASE_REG
